channel.title: Azure Linux 2.0 on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Linux 2.0 on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: Retirement: Azure Linux 2.0 on AKS
item.description:
Azure Linux 2.0 on AKS will be retired on November 30, 2025. Customers should transition to the supported Azure Linux 3.0 before that date.

  • Source: Azure Updates
